prompt.prompt: More than 80% of the states in the US have populations under 10 million. A few states, like Texas and California, have populations greater than 25 million. A histogram displaying state population data will be:

The two histograms below represent the distribution of money spent on jeans (rounded to the nearest whole dollar value). 

 ![](./jeans-cost-6th-labeled.png) ![](./jeans-cost-8th-labeled.png)   

   Which grade's data has a higher mode?
distractors: the modes are roughly the same

prompt.prompt:
The histogram below shows the Verbal SAT scores for 205 students entering a local college in the fall of 2002. 

  ![](./sat-verbal.png)  

  The median score for these 205 students is:

The Towson Tennis association has three senior tennis leagues (Monday League, Tuesday League, and Wednesday League). 

 The following histograms show the distribution of ages of players in each league. 

 ![](./tennis-leagues.png)  

  Identify the league whose players have the least variability in ages.
distractors: Impossible to tell from the given information
